Class R_StockR

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
ci553.ministore.remote.R_StockR
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteStockR_I, Serializable, Remote
public class R_StockR extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteStockR_I
Remote implementation of the StockReader interface. Provides remote access to stock information using RMI. Delegates actual data operations to the StockR class. This class handles the RMI setup and delegates the method calls to the StockR instance which interacts with the database.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • R_StockR

      public R_StockR(String url) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Constructs a new R_StockR instance. Initializes the local StockR instance.
      Parameters:
      url - The database URL (not used in this implementation)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error initializing the StockR instance

  • Method Details

    • exists

      public boolean exists(String pNum) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Checks if a product exists in the database. Delegates the call to the local StockR instance.
      Specified by:
      exists in interface RemoteStockR_I
      Parameters:
      pNum - The product number to check
      Returns:
      true if the product exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the database

    • getDetails

      public Product getDetails(String pNum) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Retrieves detailed product information from the database. Delegates the call to the local StockR instance.
      Specified by:
      getDetails in interface RemoteStockR_I
      Parameters:
      pNum - The product number to retrieve details for
      Returns:
      A Product object containing the product details
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the database

    • getImage

      public byte[] getImage(String pNum) throws RemoteException, StockException
      Retrieves the product image as a byte array from the database. Delegates the call to the local StockR instance.
      Specified by:
      getImage in interface RemoteStockR_I
      Parameters:
      pNum - The product number to retrieve the image for
      Returns:
      byte array containing the image data
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an RMI error
      StockException - If there is an error accessing the database
